item.title: 2024 目標
item.description: “首先，先祝大家新年快樂！！” 前言 此篇文的脈絡，會先總結 2023 最令我感到驕傲的三件事， 然後再分享年初規劃的 2024 目標 一、20

item.title: Clean White Theme for Hugo
item.description: Clean White Theme for Hugo CleanWhite is a clean, elegant, but fully functional blog theme for Hugo. Here is a live demo site using this theme. It is based on huxblog Jekyll Theme and Clean Blog Jekyll Theme. These two upstream projects have done awesome jobs to create a blog theme, what I’m doing here is porting it to Hugo, of which I like the simplicity and the much faster

About Me Kitty Chang was graduated from National Chung Cheng University, majoring in Accounting and Information Technology. With 1year in Accounting industry and 2+ years of experience in Marketing and Internet industry. Besides her major , she also manages Instagram x Medium x YouTube channel . Passion for creative content, book recommendations, and perspective sharing. While she is free, he likes writing business blog posts, playing table tennis & squash,
